awsAccountsDesc: Only AWS accounts that have authroization status SUCCEEDED can be tracked by this platform.
connectToDataSourceDesc: Onboard AWS accounts to this platform. Connect/disconnect to the data source to create/remove data catalogs.
awsAccountInfoDesc: The AWS accounts tracked by this platform.
dataSourceDiscoverInAWSAccount: Data source that discovered in AWS accounts.

add.addAWSAccountDesc: Setup and manage the AWS accounts that you want the platform to discover sensitive data.

org.step1: Step1: Install agent to authorize Organization delegater
org.stepDesc: The CloudFormation stack is used for authroizing AWS Organization
org.step1Copy: Copy [CloudFormationStack-AuthorizeOrganization] CloudFormation stack's Amazon S3 URL
org.step2: Step2: Authroize member accounts in Organization delegate administrator
org.step2Desc: Deploy the stack in the AWS orgnization AWS account or the delegated administrator AWS account.
org.step2list1: Log in to the AWS account of the AWS orgnization account or the delegated administrator account.
org.step2list2: Go to the CloudFormation console of the AWS account.
org.step2list4_1: In the Create stack page, enter the template URL you have copied in Step1 in
org.step2list5: Follow the steps to create the CloudFormation stack and wait until the CloudFormation stack is deployed successfully.
org.step3: Step3: Install agent stack to authorize member accounts in Organization
org.step3Copy: Copy [CloudFormationStack-AuthorizeMembers] CloudFormation stack’s Amazon S3 URL
org.step4: Step4: Install agent stack to authorize member accounts in Organization
org.step4Copy: Copy [CloudFormationStack-AuthorizeMembers] CloudFormation stack’s Amazon S3 URL
org.step5: Step5: Fill in the Organization management account id

account.step1: Step1: Copy CloudFormation template URL for agent stack
account.step1Desc: The CloudFormation stack is used for authorizing AWS account to be tracked in this platform.
account.step1Copy: Copy [CloudFormationStack-AuthorizeMembers] CloudFormation stack’s Amazon S3 URL
account.step2: Step2: Install agent CloudFormation stack for AWS account
account.step2Desc: Install the agent stack in CloudFormation in the AWS account you want to monitor.
account.step2list1: Go to the CloudFormation console of the AWS account.
account.step2list2_3: , click the right up corner button
account.step2list3_3: with the link you have copied above.
account.step2list4: Follow the steps to deploy the CloudFormation stack.
account.step2list5: Wait until the CloudFormation stack is deployed (installed) successfully.
account.step3: Step3: After successfully installed the agent stack, fill in back the account id
